title: Chocolate Chip Pancakes
ingredients: flour, sugar, eggs, milk, chocolate chips
steps: Mix the ingredients in a bowl., Pour the batter into a hot pan., Cook until golden brown.

title: Blueberry Muffins
ingredients: flour, sugar, blueberries, butter, egg, milk, baking powder
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)., Mix dry and wet ingredients separately., Combine and fold in blueberries., Bake in muffin cups for 20-25 minutes.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, bacon, parmesan cheese, black pepper
steps: Cook spaghetti al dente., Cook bacon until crispy., Mix eggs, parmesan, and pepper., Toss cooked spaghetti in egg mixture.

title: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: chicken breasts, fettuccine pasta, heavy cream, butter, garlic, parmesan cheese
steps: Sauté chicken and garlic., Cook pasta and make creamy sauce., Combine and serve with parmesan cheese.

title: Classic Chocolate Cake
ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, butter, baking soda, buttermilk
steps: Mix dry and wet ingredients., Bake in greased pans., Frost and enjoy.

title: Homemade Pizza
ingredients: pizza dough, tomato sauce, cheese, pepperoni, olives, bell peppers
steps: Roll out dough, spread sauce, add toppings., Bake in a hot oven until crust is golden., Slice and serve.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing, lemon, olive oil
steps: Toss lettuce with dressing and lemon juice., Top with croutons and parmesan., Drizzle with olive oil.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: ground beef, taco shells, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, salsa
steps: Cook beef with taco seasoning., Assemble tacos with toppings., Serve with salsa and sour cream.

title: Mango Smoothie
ingredients: mango, yogurt, milk, honey, ice cubes
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth., Pour into a glass and enjoy.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: mixed vegetables, tofu, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, sesame oil, rice
steps: Stir-fry vegetables and tofu in sesame oil., Add ginger, garlic, and soy sauce., Serve over cooked rice.

title: Mango Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken thighs, mango, coconut milk, curry powder, onion, bell pepper, basmati rice
steps: Sear chicken thighs in a pan until golden brown., Add chopped onions and bell peppers., Stir in coconut milk, diced mango, and curry powder., Simmer until chicken is cooked through., Serve over cooked basmati rice.

title: Spicy Shrimp Pasta
ingredients: shrimp, pasta, tomatoes, garlic, chili flakes, olive oil, parsley
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions., Sauté garlic and chili flakes in olive oil., Add shrimp and chopped tomatoes, cook until shrimp turns pink., Toss cooked pasta with the shrimp mixture., Garnish with parsley and serve.
